Articles.Content:
Hi everybody!

I'm trying to reach the KerbalStuff website and apparently it's broken because it answer an 502 error: bad gateway.

Could someone tell me what's happening to them? Is it only me?

Thank you very much.
The servers are down and Majiir and SirCmpwn are offline. When they are back on they will fix it, nothing much else to say.

i was about to ask

Man... I need my fix, man.... *scratches nervously*

Somebody call and wake them fools up......It's the weekend and these are the only days I have to get my Kerbal on. I'm about to start TWITCHING here!!

TOO LATE!!

And this, ladies and gentlemen, is why I recommend modders have both primary and secondary hosting sites.

For discoverability, there's always the handy dandy community mod list on the addon release forum (it's stickied) and agnostic since it just shows the different forum threads, regardless of where the mods are hosted (KS, Curse, GitHub, DropBox, MediaFire, or on some dude's thumb drive left by a dumpster in Brooklyn).
